creator: markus@emedia-solutions-wolf.de
text:
I'm using forrest to render SVG's to PNG. 
Since I upgraded to Forrest 0.5 which uses Batik 1.5 I got the following ClassCastException: 
--- 
java.lang.ClassCastException 
        at 
org.apache.batik.dom.svg.SVGOMDocument.getRootElement(SVGOMDocument.java:228) 
        at 
org.apache.batik.transcoder.SVGAbstractTranscoder.transcode(SVGAbstractTranscoder.java:152) 
        at 
org.apache.batik.transcoder.image.ImageTranscoder.transcode(ImageTranscoder.java:86) 
        at 
org.apache.batik.transcoder.XMLAbstractTranscoder.transcode(XMLAbstractTranscoder.java:132) 
        at org.apache.cocoon.serialization.SVGSerializer.notify(SVGSerializer.java:232) 
... (Stacktrace for coocon and forrest) 
--- 
In former versions the generation of PNG worked well.

I need more info to do anything with this.
Can you provide sample SVG content?
Does the content rendering ok with Batik's transcoder?
Is this still a problem?

The code looks right, so it looks to me like the way 
Forrest is building the document may be the problem.
creator: deweese@apache.org

text:
Since you did not respond, I am closing this bug.  

Feel free to reopen it if you can provide more information on the bug
in the future.
creator: deweese@apache.org
